title: Why when I take photos it takes me to the older photo i have been taken to preview?
content:
In Google 4 & 4 XL after taking the shoot of any photos, i go to the library to see it, the older photo shows instead of the one i take so i have to go out to the camera then open the library again to see the preview of the new photo?
Google team: what happened to you?
As user of pixel 1, 2 and 3 i am very disappointed from the Google 4 overall
